reviews.snippet:
Had never tasted wagyu before. What better place to try it than the place where it originates. And wow, was it amazing!!

The meat was perfect, cooked ourselves on the grill at our table. The service was perfect - very quick and efficient. The atmosphere, ambiance and mood lighting were perfect too.

I will definitely return before I go home!!

Thank you

reviews.snippet:
I’ve visited this place a few times, and it has become my favorite yakiniku restaurant in the country. the food is delicious, the riverside view in Asakusa is beautiful, and everything is prepared halal. Compared to the Okachimachi branch, the Asakusa location is smaller in both space and grill size, and a little more expensive, but I feel the view and atmosphere make it worthwhile. The location is also very accessible and close to nearby attractions, which adds to the overall experience.

The staff are always kind, attentive, and able to speak English well, which makes each visit smooth and enjoyable. Personally, I prefer the calmer atmosphere in Asakusa, although the Okachimachi branch may be more suitable if you are coming with a large group, as it offers more space.

extracted_snippet.original:

The staff are always kind, attentive, and able to speak English well, which makes each visit smooth and enjoyable. Personally, I prefer the calmer atmosphere in Asakusa, although the Okachimachi branch may be more suitable if you are coming with a large group, as it offers more space.

response.snippet: Thank you for your continued visits and for choosing us as your favorite yakiniku restaurant. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoy the food, our beautiful riverside view, and the service provided by our staff. We appreciate your feedback on the differences between our branches and are glad that you find the Asakusa location worthwhile despite its smaller size. We hope to welcome you back soon!
